TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The game is replaced by CoD of Duty.

I wish for the smelliness of ten durians.
Granted, however durians now smell good.

Granted, but durians don't smell anymore.

I wish I cute chibi.

Cherubi? Did You Say? Granted. You now reside in a cramped pokeball.

I wish for sniper skillz in tf2.

Granted, but you are only skilled with the Melee.

I wish for a mars bar.

Granted. Curiosity is holding it on Mars.

I wish for a Starburst.

Sun goes nova.

I'm still waiting for my chocolate.

Granted. Have some unsweetened baker's chocolate.

I wish more laptop manufacturers used trackpoints.

Granted. Consumers start believing that trackpoints were created to suck people's noses out. A giant horde of angry people with pitchforks is in front of your house.

I wish that there was a company that makes stars.

Granted. They make Death Stars.

I wish there was a peaceful company that made planets.

Granted. They are quickly attacked politically attacked by a company that uses these planets to destroy other planets.

I wish for a million dollars.

Granted. Inflation runs rampant, making one million dollars equivalent to $2.50 in today's money.

I wish for everyone to be more polite and considerate.

Edit: Ha ha vexx32, I already live in Canada! Rumors of our politeness are greatly exaggerated.

Edited September 9, 2014 by Red Iron Crown

Granted; here's a ticket to Canada.

I wish for the world.

Granted, Mercury is yours, and as a bonus - we're sending you there right away!!!

I wish I had a WiFi hot spot in my head.

Granted: everyone knows the password but you~

I wish I could make machines human.

Granted, but you cannot control your power. Curiosity dies from lack of air, all GPS sats are now corpses, and your computer is too big.

I wish for the ability to walk on air.

Granted. However, you can no longer walk on land. You end up living inside the ground, trapped there by the air.

I wish I could walk on forum posts.
Granted. However, the trolls drive you mad and you go completely insane.

You are now a potato. YOU GOTTA WISH FOR SOMETHING!

I wish I was pie. Or pi. Or tau/2. Anything works really, as long as it has something to do with pie.

(Dang, I forgot to wish for something! *facepalm*)

Granted, but pie isn't conscious... or alive at all, for that matter.

I wish for the ability to alter time.

Granted. All your clocks are looking pretty... melted...

I wish for molten clocks.

Granted, but they're dumped on your face.

I wish for frozen plastic.

Granted. Your plastic has just been removed from its liquid nitrogen bath, and becomes lots of tiny bits on contact with the ground!

Why did you want frozen plastic anyway?

I wish I was good at writing music.

Granted. By the time the training session is (inconveniently) over, people stopped using Italian music format. This has been true for a few hundred years.

I wish that I was hit by a paintbrush.

You were hit by a paintbrush. Unfortunately, you were also hit by a paintbrush.

I wish people weren't such wet blankets about the prospects of fusion power.
